author: IGN
description:
Check out the Night Patrol trailer for this upcoming vampire cop thriller movie starring Jermaine Fowler, Justin Long, RJ Cyler, Freddie Gibbs, CM Punk, YG, Flying Lotus, Dermot Mulroney, Jon Oswald, and Nicki Micheaux.

An LAPD officer must put aside his differences with the area’s street gangs when he discovers a local police task force is harboring a horrific secret that endangers the residents of the housing projects he grew up in.

Night Patrol is written by Ryan Prows, Shaye Ogbonna, Tim Cairo, and Jake Gibson. 

Night Patrol, directed by Ryan Prows, opens in theaters on January 16, 2026.
title: Night Patrol - Official Trailer (2026) Jermaine Fowler, Justin Long, RJ Cyler

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Launch Trailer for Bleach: Soul Resonance, a mobile anime action RPG developed by Nuverse. Players will play through the epic story in the palm of their hands to unleash Bankai and engage in deep combat with the Hollows. Bleach: Soul Resonance is launching on November 21 for iOS and Android.

#BleachSoulResonance #Gaming #IGN
title: Bleach: Soul Resonance - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Expedition Showcase Update 1.7 Overview Trailer for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, a first-person open world survival shooter developed by GSC Game World. Players can now access the Expedition 1.7 Update, packed with a suite of adjustments and settings that make the game more immersive and challenging for players who dare take on the challenge. Fixes and improvements to the A-Life system, new anomalies, stamina and sprint adjustments, and more are all available with the Expedition 1.7 Update for Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl, available now for Xbox Series X|S and PC (Steam, Epic Games Store, and GoG).

#Stalker2HeartOfChornobyl #Gaming #IGN
title: Stalker 2: Heart of Chornobyl - Official Expedition Showcase Update 1.7 Overview Trailer

There's an early side quest on Where Winds Meet called Echoes of Old Battles, and if you've started it, there's a good chance you were stumped by the wall puzzle in the secret chamber. This video is a complete guide to starting and finishing the quest, though it doesn't include the locations of every single treasure chest.

author: IGN
description:
Marvel’s Deadpool VR reviewed by Gabriel Moss on Meta Quest 3 and 3S.

Marvel's Deadpool VR adds to a growing roster of great licensed superhero games that help prove VR games can be more than shallow tie-ins. Its kinetic combat system is engaging for the entire 10-hour campaign, and the alternate Deadpool variants with genuinely funny unique dialogue make replaying levels feel worthwhile rather than like padding. As the default Deadpool, however, Neil Patrick Harris’s performance delivers exactly what you'd hope for, and the reality show framing enhances the overall story rather than feeling gimmicky. If you’re up for dark, low-brow comedy and fourth-wall-breaking meta-humor, then this is easily the most complete and entertaining superhero VR experience since Batman: Arkham Shadow. Just make sure you're playing on Quest 3 to get the most out of its vibrant visuals.
title: Marvel’s Deadpool VR Review

Players will diagnose a suite of issues, from network problems, server issues, and more, to solve problems and rise through the ranks. IT Specialist Simulator is available now on PC (Steam).

#IGN #Gaming

Players will get the rundown on the narrative strings and implications for the multiplayer world of Escape from Tarkov in time for the game's Version 1.0 release. Escape from Tarkov Version 1.0 is available now for PC.

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Assassin's Creed Mirage trailer to see what's coming with the Valley of Memory free content update, which brings a free story expansion, new contracts, full game improvements, and more to the action-adventure game. The Assassin's Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory update launches on November 18, 2025.

In Assassin’s Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice. After an act of deadly retribution, Basim flees Baghdad and joins an ancient organization – The Hidden Ones. As he learns their mysterious rituals and powerful tenets, he will hone his unique abilities, discover his true nature, and come to understand a new Creed – one that will change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

#IGN #Gaming #AssassinsCreed
title: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Valley of Memory - Official Free Update Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a fresh look at gameplay from Beyond These Stars in this latest trailer for the upcoming sci-fi city builder game set on the back of a space whale. In Beyond These Stars, build a city on the back of a Space Whale and learn to coexist as you journey through the stars. Manage intricate supply chains and the needs of your people as you build outposts, meet aliens, and uncover the mysteries of the universe. Beyond These Stars will be available in Early Access on PC (GOG, Steam, and Epic Games Store) in 2026. An updated demo is out now.

#IGN Gaming
title: Beyond These Stars - Official Gameplay Trailer #2

La Lupa is playable for a limited time on November 26 - December 1, before her official launch in Season 20 for Overwatch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #Overwatch2

author: IGN
description:
Check out the Moana teaser trailer for this upcoming live-action reimagining of the animated film Moana. The live-action Moana stars Catherine Lagaʻaia as Moana and Dwayne Johnson, who reprises his role as the trickster demigod Maui. 

In addition to Lagaʻaia and Johnson, the “Moana” cast includes Auckland, New Zealand, native John Tui as Moana’s no-nonsense father, Chief Tui; Samoan-New Zealander Frankie Adams, who portrays Moana’s playful and strong-willed mother, Sina; and Rena Owen, from Bay of Islands, New Zealand, as Moana’s revered Gramma Tala.

In Disney’s live-action reimagining of the beloved Oscar-nominated animated adventure, Moana (Catherine Lagaʻaia) answers the Ocean’s call and, for the first time, voyages beyond the reef of her island of Motunui with the infamous demigod Maui (Dwayne Johnson) on an unforgettable journey to restore prosperity to her people. 

The film is directed by Emmy and Tony Award winner Thomas Kail (“Hamilton”); produced by Dwayne Johnson, Beau Fl
title: Moana - Official Teaser Trailer (2026) Catherine Lagaʻaia, Dwayne Johnson

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'Igniting the Next Chapter' Featurette for Avatar: Fire and Ash, the third installment in James Cameron's sci-fi drama action films distributed by 20th Century Studios. Join the cast and crew of the upcoming Avatar: Fire and Ash, including Zoe Saldana, James Cameron, Sam Worthington, and Kate Winslet, on the development of the next installment in the franchise. Avatar: Fire and Ash is in theaters worldwide in IMAX 3D, Dolby Cinema 3D, RealD 3D, Cinemark XD, 4DX, ScreenX, and premium screens everywhere on December 19, 2025.

With Avatar: Fire and Ash, James Cameron takes audiences back to Pandora in an immersive new adventure with Marine turned Na’vi leader Jake Sully, Na’vi warrior Neytiri, and the Sully family. 

Avatar: Fire and Ash stars Sam Worthington, Zoe Saldaña, Sigourney Weaver, Stephen Lang, and more. The film is directed by James Cameron alongside the screenplay by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda Silver. The story is by James Cameron & Rick Jaffa & Amanda
title: Avatar: Fire and Ash - Official 'Igniting the Next Chapter' Featurette (2025) Zoe Saldaña

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Accolades Trailer for ARC Raiders, the hit third-person action extraction shooter developed by Embark Studios. Players will head into the hectic and violent battlefields of a post-apocalyptic top-side, filled with deadly enemy ARC machines, valuable resources, and other Raiders willing to aid or deceive to bring loot back to Speranza. Get a look at the critical reception behind ARC Raiders, available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#ARCRaiders #Gaming #IGN

author: IGN
description:
Thanks to INNO3D and their range of Nvidia RTX 50 series cards, we have stacked the RTX 5060, RTX 5070 and RTX 5080 head to head. In a Benchmark Battlefield of Graphics, High Frame Rates, Low Latency and the best settings for each card. Using the suite of RTX features in DLSS 4, Reflex Low Latency and Multi Frame Generation to cover what spec, price and performance works best for all. In this benchmark comparison, we break down the features of each card, on high end PC specification and push each card as fast as they can go, in DICE's excellent, high performance, multiplayer hit, Battlefield 6.

Chapters
0:00 Introduction
1:22 The Cards, Specifications and Testing Methodology
2:48 Battlefield 6, Frostbite engine, Input Latency, Game Settings and baseline
3:39 RTX 5060 Best Settings and comparisons
4:40 RTX 5060 1080p DLSS Quality Performance & Latency
5:35 RTX 5060 1080p DLSS Quality 4x MFG Performance & Latency
6:58 RTX 5070 1440p DLSS Quality Performance & Latency
8:15 RTX 5070 1440
title: Battlefield 6 vs RTX 50 Series - Multiplayer Performance, Graphics & Latency Benchmarks

author: IGN
description:
Join Ice Spice for a behind-the-scenes look at her role in The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants, an upcoming animated film starring Tom Kenny, Clancy Brown, Rodger Bumpass, Bill Fagerbakke, Carolyn Lawrence, Mr. Lawrence, George Lopez, Isis “Ice Spice” Gaston, Arturo Castro, Sherry Cola with Regina Hall and Mark Hamill. In this new featurette, Ice Spice also discusses creating the original song "Big Guy" for the movie. 

SpongeBob and his Bikini Bottom friends set sail in their biggest, all-new, can’t miss cinematic event ever…The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants. Desperate to be a big guy, SpongeBob sets out to prove his bravery to Mr. Krabs by following The Flying Dutchman – a mysterious swashbuckling ghost pirate – on a seafaring comedy-adventure that takes him to the deepest depths of the deep sea, where no Sponge has gone before.

The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants is executive produced by Marc Ceccarelli, Vincent Waller, Pete Chiappetta, Anthony Tittanegro
title: The SpongeBob Movie: Search for SquarePants - Official Ice Spice Behind-the-Scenes Video

author: IGN
description: Engineer the marble run of your dreams. No need to get it perfect – just release your marbles and let the good times roll. Watch the latest Cozy Marbles trailer for this upcoming simulator game. In Cozy Marbles, tinker with freeform construction tools and a rich library of parts. Design awesome loops, twists and drops, then roll your marbles off on their adventure. Take “playing with marbles” to a whole new level by guiding them across complex courses, bouncing them over obstacles with boosters and ramps, and even shooting them from cannons. Cozy Marbles will be available on PC (Steam) in 2026, and a playtest is available now on Steam.
title: Cozy Marbles - Official Playtest Announcement Trailer
